소리 리스트
	효과음
		https://jdwasabi.itch.io/8-bit-16-bit-sound-effects-pack 저작권자 표시
		https://shapeforms.itch.io/shapeforms-audio-free-sfx 없음
		https://hitrison.itch.io/menu-sfx-pack 없음
		https://leohpaz.itch.io/minifantasy-forgotten-plains-sfx-pack 없음
	BGM
		https://jdsherbert.itch.io/minigame-music-pack 저작권자 표시
		https://sonatina.itch.io/infinity-crystal 저작권자 표시
기본적으로 재배포 및 음원 판매 금지라고 생각하는 것이 좋음.

UI 음
	MenuSFX\Abstract\abs-popdown-1
	MenuSFX\Abstract\abs-popdown-1-fast
	MenuSFX\Abstract\abs-popdown-2
	MenuSFX\Abstract\abs-popdown-2-fast
	MenuSFX\Abstract\abs-popdown-3
	MenuSFX\Abstract\abs-popdown-3-fast
	MenuSFX\Abstract\abs-popup-1
	MenuSFX\Abstract\abs-popup-1-fast
	MenuSFX\Abstract\abs-popup-2
	MenuSFX\Abstract\abs-popup-2-fast
	MenuSFX\Abstract\abs-popup-3
	MenuSFX\Abstract\abs-popup-3-fast
획득음
	8-bit 16-bit Sound Effects\Big Egg collect 1
드랍음
	Shapeforms Audio Free Sound Effects\The Mint – Coins and Money Preview\AUDIO\Coin Flung
템창 여는 소리
	Shapeforms Audio Free Sound Effects\The Mint – Coins and Money Preview\AUDIO\Coins in Sack Dropped on Soft Surface

버튼음
	MenuSFX\Abstract\abs-pointer-1
	MenuSFX\Abstract\abs-pointer-2
	MenuSFX\Abstract\abs-pointer-3
	MenuSFX\Abstract\abs-pointer-3-alt
	확인
		8-bit 16-bit Sound Effects\Confirm 1
		8-bit 16-bit Sound Effects\Fruit collect 1
		8-bit 16-bit Sound Effects\Select 1
		MenuSFX\Abstract\abs-confirm-1
		MenuSFX\Abstract\abs-confirm-2
		MenuSFX\Abstract\abs-confirm-3

		MenuSFX\Abstract\abs-cancel-2

	효과음 테스트
